source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic video. The shot is a wide-angle view from the bow of a massive container ship at sea. Colorful shipping containers are stacked high on the deck, leading the eye toward the horizon under a vast, cloud-streaked sky, with a few other distant vessels visible on the calm water.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic video. The shot is a wide-angle view from the bow of a massive container ship at sea. Colorful shipping containers are stacked high on the deck, leading the eye toward the horizon under a vast, cloud-streaked sky, with a few other distant vessels visible on the calm water.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several seagulls are flying close to the ship, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenic video. The shot is a wide-angle view from the bow of a massive container ship at sea. Colorful shipping containers are stacked high on the deck, leading the eye toward the horizon under a vast, cloud-streaked sky, with several seagulls flying close to the ship and a few other distant vessels visible on the calm water.
